verses.verse: And the LORD <WH3068> spake <WH1696> unto Moses <WH4872> and unto Aaron <WH175>, saying <WH559>,

Take <WH5375> the sum <WH7218> of the sons <WH1121> of Kohath <WH6955> from among <WH8432> the sons <WH1121> of Levi <WH3878>, after their families <WH4940>, by the house <WH1004> of their fathers <WH1>,

From thirty <WH7970> years <WH8141> old <WH1121> and upward <WH4605> even until fifty <WH2572> years <WH8141> old <WH1121>, all that enter <WH935> into the host <WH6635>, to do <WH6213> the work <WH4399> in the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation <WH4150>.
This shall be the service <WH5656> of the sons <WH1121> of Kohath <WH6955> in the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation <WH4150>, about the most <WH6944> holy things <WH6944>:

¶ And when the camp <WH4264> setteth forward <WH5265>, Aaron <WH175> shall come <WH935>, and his sons <WH1121>, and they shall take down <WH3381> the covering <WH4539> vail <WH6532>, and cover <WH3680> the ark <WH727> of testimony <WH5715> with it:

And shall put <WH5414> thereon the covering <WH3681> of badgers' <WH8476> skins <WH5785>, and shall spread <WH6566> over <WH4605> it a cloth <WH899> wholly <WH3632> of blue <WH8504>, and shall put <WH7760> in the staves <WH905> thereof.

And upon the table <WH7979> of shewbread <WH6440> they shall spread <WH6566> a cloth <WH899> of blue <WH8504>, and put <WH5414> thereon the dishes <WH7086>, and the spoons <WH3709>, and the bowls <WH4518>, and covers <WH7184> to cover withal <WH5262>: and the continual <WH8548> bread <WH3899> shall be thereon:

And they shall spread <WH6566> upon them a cloth <WH899> of scarlet <WH8438> <WH8144>, and cover <WH3680> the same with a covering <WH4372> of badgers' <WH8476> skins <WH5785>, and shall put <WH7760> in the staves <WH905> thereof.

And they shall take <WH3947> a cloth <WH899> of blue <WH8504>, and cover <WH3680> the candlestick <WH4501> of the light <WH3974>, and his lamps <WH5216>, and his tongs <WH4457>, and his snuffdishes <WH4289>, and all the oil <WH8081> vessels <WH3627> thereof, wherewith they minister <WH8334> unto it:
And they shall put <WH5414> it and all the vessels <WH3627> thereof within a covering <WH4372> of badgers' <WH8476> skins <WH5785>, and shall put <WH5414> it upon a bar <WH4132>.

And upon the golden <WH2091> altar <WH4196> they shall spread <WH6566> a cloth <WH899> of blue <WH8504>, and cover <WH3680> it with a covering <WH4372> of badgers' <WH8476> skins <WH5785>, and shall put <WH7760> to the staves <WH905> thereof:

And they shall take <WH3947> all the instruments <WH3627> of ministry <WH8335>, wherewith they minister <WH8334> in the sanctuary <WH6944>, and put <WH5414> them in a cloth <WH899> of blue <WH8504>, and cover <WH3680> them with a covering <WH4372> of badgers' <WH8476> skins <WH5785>, and shall put <WH5414> them on a bar <WH4132>:
And they shall take away the ashes <WH1878> from the altar <WH4196>, and spread <WH6566> a purple <WH713> cloth <WH899> thereon:

And they shall put <WH5414> upon it all the vessels <WH3627> thereof, wherewith they minister <WH8334> about it, even the censers <WH4289>, the fleshhooks <WH4207>, and the shovels <WH3257>, and the basons <WH4219>, all the vessels <WH3627> of the altar <WH4196>; and they shall spread <WH6566> upon it a covering <WH3681> of badgers' <WH8476> skins <WH5785>, and put <WH7760> to the staves <WH905> of it.

And when Aaron <WH175> and his sons <WH1121> have made an end <WH3615> of covering <WH3680> the sanctuary <WH6944>, and all the vessels <WH3627> of the sanctuary <WH6944>, as the camp <WH4264> is to set forward <WH5265>; after <WH310> that, the sons <WH1121> of Kohath <WH6955> shall come <WH935> to bear <WH5375> it: but they shall not touch <WH5060> any holy thing <WH6944>, lest they die <WH4191>. These things are the burden <WH4853> of the sons <WH1121> of Kohath <WH6955> in the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation <WH4150>.

¶ And to the office <WH6486> of Eleazar <WH499> the son <WH1121> of Aaron <WH175> the priest <WH3548> pertaineth the oil <WH8081> for the light <WH3974>, and the sweet <WH5561> incense <WH7004>, and the daily <WH8548> meat offering <WH4503>, and the anointing <WH4888> oil <WH8081>, and the oversight <WH6486> of all the tabernacle <WH4908>, and of all that therein is, in the sanctuary <WH6944>, and in the vessels <WH3627> thereof.
¶ And the LORD <WH3068> spake <WH1696> unto Moses <WH4872> and unto Aaron <WH175>, saying <WH559>,
Cut ye not off <WH3772> the tribe <WH7626> of the families <WH4940> of the Kohathites <WH6956> from among <WH8432> the Levites <WH3881>:

But thus do <WH6213> unto them, that they may live <WH2421>, and not die <WH4191>, when they approach <WH5066> unto the most <WH6944> holy things <WH6944>: Aaron <WH175> and his sons <WH1121> shall go in <WH935>, and appoint <WH7760> them every <WH376> one <WH376> to his service <WH5656> and to his burden <WH4853>:
But they shall not go in <WH935> to see <WH7200> when the holy things <WH6944> are covered <WH1104>, lest they die <WH4191>.
¶ And the LORD <WH3068> spake <WH1696> unto Moses <WH4872>, saying <WH559>,
Take <WH5375> also the sum <WH7218> of the sons <WH1121> of Gershon <WH1648>, throughout the houses <WH1004> of their fathers <WH1>, by their families <WH4940>;

From thirty <WH7970> years <WH8141> old <WH1121> and upward <WH4605> until fifty <WH2572> years <WH8141> old <WH1121> shalt thou number <WH6485> them; all that enter in <WH935> to perform <WH6633> the service <WH6635>, to do <WH5647> the work <WH5656> in the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation <WH4150>.
This is the service <WH5656> of the families <WH4940> of the Gershonites <WH1649>, to serve <WH5647>, and for burdens <WH4853>:

And they shall bear <WH5375> the curtains <WH3407> of the tabernacle <WH4908>, and the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation <WH4150>, his covering <WH4372>, and the covering <WH4372> of the badgers' <WH8476> skins that is above <WH4605> upon it, and the hanging <WH4539> for the door <WH6607> of the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation <WH4150>,

And the hangings <WH7050> of the court <WH2691>, and the hanging <WH4539> for the door <WH6607> of the gate <WH8179> of the court <WH2691>, which is by the tabernacle <WH4908> and by the altar <WH4196> round about <WH5439>, and their cords <WH4340>, and all the instruments <WH3627> of their service <WH5656>, and all that is made <WH6213> for them: so shall they serve <WH5647>.

At the appointment <WH6310> of Aaron <WH175> and his sons <WH1121> shall be all the service <WH5656> of the sons <WH1121> of the Gershonites <WH1649>, in all their burdens <WH4853>, and in all their service <WH5656>: and ye shall appoint <WH6485> unto them in charge <WH4931> all their burdens <WH4853>.

This is the service <WH5656> of the families <WH4940> of the sons <WH1121> of Gershon <WH1649> in the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation <WH4150>: and their charge <WH4931> shall be under the hand <WH3027> of Ithamar <WH385> the son <WH1121> of Aaron <WH175> the priest <WH3548>.
¶ As for the sons <WH1121> of Merari <WH4847>, thou shalt number <WH6485> them after their families <WH4940>, by the house <WH1004> of their fathers <WH1>;

From thirty <WH7970> years <WH8141> old <WH1121> and upward <WH4605> even unto fifty <WH2572> years <WH8141> old <WH1121> shalt thou number <WH6485> them, every one that entereth <WH935> into the service <WH6635>, to do <WH5647> the work <WH5656> of the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation <WH4150>.

And this is the charge <WH4931> of their burden <WH4853>, according to all their service <WH5656> in the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation <WH4150>; the boards <WH7175> of the tabernacle <WH4908>, and the bars <WH1280> thereof, and the pillars <WH5982> thereof, and sockets <WH134> thereof,

And the pillars <WH5982> of the court <WH2691> round about <WH5439>, and their sockets <WH134>, and their pins <WH3489>, and their cords <WH4340>, with all their instruments <WH3627>, and with all their service <WH5656>: and by name <WH8034> ye shall reckon <WH6485> the instruments <WH3627> of the charge <WH4931> of their burden <WH4853>.

This is the service <WH5656> of the families <WH4940> of the sons <WH1121> of Merari <WH4847>, according to all their service <WH5656>, in the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation <WH4150>, under the hand <WH3027> of Ithamar <WH385> the son <WH1121> of Aaron <WH175> the priest <WH3548>.

¶ And Moses <WH4872> and Aaron <WH175> and the chief <WH5387> of the congregation <WH5712> numbered <WH6485> the sons <WH1121> of the Kohathites <WH6956> after their families <WH4940>, and after the house <WH1004> of their fathers <WH1>,

From thirty <WH7970> years <WH8141> old <WH1121> and upward <WH4605> even unto fifty <WH2572> years <WH8141> old <WH1121>, every one that entereth <WH935> into the service <WH6635>, for the work <WH5656> in the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation <WH4150>:
And those that were numbered <WH6485> of them by their families <WH4940> were two thousand <WH505> seven <WH7651> hundred <WH3967> and fifty <WH2572>.

These were they that were numbered <WH6485> of the families <WH4940> of the Kohathites <WH6956>, all that might do service <WH5647> in the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation <WH4150>, which Moses <WH4872> and Aaron <WH175> did number <WH6485> according to the commandment <WH6310> of the LORD <WH3068> by the hand <WH3027> of Moses <WH4872>.
And those that were numbered <WH6485> of the sons <WH1121> of Gershon <WH1648>, throughout their families <WH4940>, and by the house <WH1004> of their fathers <WH1>,

From thirty <WH7970> years <WH8141> old <WH1121> and upward <WH4605> even unto fifty <WH2572> years <WH8141> old <WH1121>, every one that entereth <WH935> into the service <WH6635>, for the work <WH5656> in the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation <WH4150>,

Even those that were numbered <WH6485> of them, throughout their families <WH4940>, by the house <WH1004> of their fathers <WH1>, were two thousand <WH505> and six <WH8337> hundred <WH3967> and thirty <WH7970>.

These are they that were numbered <WH6485> of the families <WH4940> of the sons <WH1121> of Gershon <WH1648>, of all that might do service <WH5647> in the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation <WH4150>, whom Moses <WH4872> and Aaron <WH175> did number <WH6485> according to the commandment <WH6310> of the LORD <WH3068>.
¶ And those that were numbered <WH6485> of the families <WH4940> of the sons <WH1121> of Merari <WH4847>, throughout their families <WH4940>, by the house <WH1004> of their fathers <WH1>,

From thirty <WH7970> years <WH8141> old <WH1121> and upward <WH4605> even unto fifty <WH2572> years <WH8141> old <WH1121>, every one that entereth <WH935> into the service <WH6635>, for the work <WH5656> in the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation <WH4150>,
Even those that were numbered <WH6485> of them after their families <WH4940>, were three <WH7969> thousand <WH505> and two hundred <WH3967>.

These be those that were numbered <WH6485> of the families <WH4940> of the sons <WH1121> of Merari <WH4847>, whom Moses <WH4872> and Aaron <WH175> numbered <WH6485> according to the word <WH6310> of the LORD <WH3068> by the hand <WH3027> of Moses <WH4872>.

All those that were numbered <WH6485> of the Levites <WH3881>, whom Moses <WH4872> and Aaron <WH175> and the chief <WH5387> of Israel <WH3478> numbered <WH6485>, after their families <WH4940>, and after the house <WH1004> of their fathers <WH1>,

From thirty <WH7970> years <WH8141> old <WH1121> and upward <WH4605> even unto fifty <WH2572> years <WH8141> old <WH1121>, every one that came <WH935> to do <WH5647> the service of the ministry <WH5656>, and the service <WH5656> of the burden <WH4853> in the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation <WH4150>,
Even those that were numbered <WH6485> of them, were eight <WH8083> thousand <WH505> and five <WH2568> hundred <WH3967> and fourscore <WH8084>.

According to the commandment <WH6310> of the LORD <WH3068> they were numbered <WH6485> by the hand <WH3027> of Moses <WH4872>, every <WH376> one <WH376> according to his service <WH5656>, and according to his burden <WH4853>: thus were they numbered <WH6485> of him, as the LORD <WH3068> commanded <WH6680> Moses <WH4872>.
